title: Band-Aid
content: Self-care, self-love, bandage, wounds, cover-up, quick-fix, „just rip it off,„ pain is only temporary, a call to fix what is ailing you.

title: Blood
content: Pain, release, self-sacrifice, commitment, pact, deep connection to the body, circulation, pulse, life force, life itself, violence, destruction, „caught red-handed,„ womanhood, motherhood, family lineage, murder, THE PART OF THE CREATIVE PROCESS WHERE GETTING INVOLVED IS MESSY BUT NECESSARY, chords, connection, deep bond.

title: Breath
content: Space, relaxation, zen, meditation, deep inner peace, contentment, life force, victory, „the means is the end,„ process, life, cycle, motivation, release, all-seeing, deep awareness, understanding, connection, dance of life, victory, arrival, enlightenment, love, deep acceptance, „sitting with something,„ everything happening in its own time, at its own pace, in its own way. *BREATH IS A CARD THAT SIGNIFIES A MOST MASTERFUL STATE, INNER VICTORY AND ARRIVAL*

title: Broken Heart
content: THE REALITY OF ALL LOVE, duality, pain, love, end to a chapter, new beginning, facing an inner truth, acceptance, facing your feelings, TRUTH, shadow self, reconciling pain, evidence of caring, reconciling karma.

title: Bulldozer
content: CLEAR THE WAY, DEEP INNER STRENGTH, necessary destruction, construction, move, haul away, evidence of heavy burdens, major clearing of the old, one second it’s there- another it’s not, total removal.
